name: Movement Level in Unreal
description: A quick level I made using the assets offered from the "Stylized Egypt" pack on the Unreal marketplace. A quick proof-of-concept I made in about 2 days (10-ish hours) with three movement-based abilities for the player to get through, and a progression/checkpoint system. Download and play instructions are detailed below. Press P to pause, and WASD to move. No dedicated controller compatibility.
